column1: Little Goat Diner////The service was definitely of the caliber I'd expect from a Stephanie Izard restaurant. They quoted us a 30-45 minute wait but it turned out to be less than 20! They also texted us when our table was ready which was so great
column2: definitely something I'd take advantage of during warmer weather. Additionally
column3: our waitress was helpful in answering our questions and very attentive. I also appreciated them bringing our second carafe of mimosas so quickly there wasn't a dry glass!
